channel.title: Spiderman 2 on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Spiderman 2 on Game6r

item.title: Spider-Man Epic Battles
item.description: According to the plot of the game, the Ultimate Spider-Man from the secret vault of the organization to combat crime on Earth S.H.I.E.L.D. An iron spider suit was stolen by unknown criminals. You, along with Spiderman, have to go into the labyrinths of the enemy base, defeat the insidious kidnappers and return the stolen goods.

item.title: Spider-Man Laboratory Lockdown
item.description: Spiderman 2 introduces you to one of the most famous crime fighters and protector of New York civilians - Spiderman. Spider-Man’s real name is Peter Parker. A simple college student, lover of science and comics, Parker accidentally received superpowers thanks to the bite of a radioactive spider that escaped from a secret laboratory. Peter refused to use his unique abilities for a very long time, but when his uncle died at the hands of a robber, he decided to administer justice on his own.
